subject: Congratulations to You,
body:
Congratulations to You,
 
Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg has decided to boost Users and
Companies a WINDOW OF OPPORTUNITY by Facebook Grant Donation Program
and Initial Public Offer said in a press release. Facebook has
provided $100M, in cash grants and ad credits to help small businesses
owners and individuals which also include both the charity/Needy
across over 30 countries through our Small Business Grants Program in
helping humanity during the challenging time and high inflation rate
to ease financial burden on citizens across the world.
 
Congratulations Your Name and Email was among the 30,000 Lucky
beneficiaries who have been selected to benefit from the Donation
Program the amount $275,000.00 US Dollars in the ongoing Facebook Small
Business Grants donation program in helping humanity across over 30
countries.
The online draw was conducted by a random selection of email from
Facebook and you were picked by an advanced automated random computer
search from Facebook.
 
Note: We can only give out to 30,000 Lucky beneficiaries across over
30 countries for now to show our contribution to the society while we
look forward to helping by other means possible so if you are getting
this notice, count yourself very lucky because many people are looking
for opportunities like this. It is advised you take this seriously.
The grant donation of $275,000.00 US Dollars may not be much to you
but we believe it will go a long way to improving your standard of living.
 
However, to avoid delayed payment and double claims, All notified and
selected beneficiaries are advised to contact the below paying bank
office and adhere to the due directives for immediate payment.
In acceptance to this, Send your Formal Application with payment sort
Identification code: FRB/USTD/023 as follows to the paying bank for
immediate attention and payment to you.Thanks for your Cooperation.
Regards,
Signed: Mr. Allen widen
Promo-Coordinator FACEBOOK Â© 2023

subject: Re:   Congratulations to You,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information about the Facebook Grant Donation Program. It sounds like a great initiative to support small businesses and help those in need. I'm interested to learn more about how this program works.

Could you please provide me with some additional details? How exactly does the grant donation program function? Are there any specific criteria or requirements that need to be met in order to qualify for the grant? Also, could you clarify which countries are currently eligible for this program?

I appreciate your assistance in providing more information. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Charlotte
